nodes.text: Chapter 2: Season 5, also known as Season 5, is the fifteenth season featured in Epic Games' videogame Fortnite Battle Royale which began on December 2, 2020.

Although not centered around Star Wars, the season includes various The Mandalorian content such as a Din Djarin cosmetic skin, a Grogu pet, and the Razor Crest. When a user made a purchase during the first month of the season, they were able to receive two free months of Disney+. It is the second Star Wars crossover with Epic Games, the first being the Fortnite X Star Wars event.
